University Hospital of Heraklion (PAGNI) e-Rantevou

Online Doctors Appointment · Hospital · e-Services

Design and development of the UI for PAGNI's online booking service, called "e-Rantevou".

The Client

University Hospital of Heraklion (PAGNI)

Voutes

71110 Heraklion

Greece

The Project

e-Rantevou software offers the possibility of booking a hospital appointment online.

I designed the User Interface (UI) and implemented it with HTML5, Bootstrap, JavaScript and PHP.

View Website

What I Delivered

  • Responsive UI
  • Administrative Dashboard
  • Bootstrap Components
  • Minimal Design

My Services

  • UX and UI Design
  • Front-end Development
